document_data.name: Urgan's Best Boots
document_data.mainbody: '''Urgan's Best Boots''' was a footwear store in [[Suzail]], [[Cormyr]].
document_data.Structure: The store room was underneath the shop accessed via a trapdoor. The store room leads via a stone passageway to the cellars beneath the noble court.
